mapper.update: CREATE TABLE ${tableName} ( `id` INT (11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键', `device_no` VARCHAR (50) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '设备号', `date_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '接受日期', `lampblack` DECIMAL (6, 2) DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '油烟浓度', `lampblack_flag` CHAR (5) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '油烟浓度状态值', `pm` DECIMAL (6, 2) DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '颗粒物浓度', `pm_flag` CHAR (5) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '颗粒物状态值', `nmhc` DECIMAL (6, 2) DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '非甲烷总烃浓度', `nmhc_flag` CHAR (5) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '非甲烷总烃状态值', `fan_flag` INT (11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '风机状态值', `purifier_flag` INT (11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '净化器状态值', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `device_no` (`device_no`, `date_time`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET = utf8;
